job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongData ScientistAnalyst strongppstrongLocation SFO CA Remote can work from anywhere but wiling to work Pacific hoursstrongppstrong3 Rounds of InterviewstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongMandatorystrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp3 years of data science data analytics or business intelligence experienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong understanding of SQLppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with conducting data analysis in Python and  or RppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations ppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levelsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insightsppstrongnbspstrongppstrongPlusesstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspFamiliarity with SupersetppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspFamiliarity with running weblab experiments efficacy studies or product validation testsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspFamiliarity with machine learning basicsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspFamiliarity with Client infrastructure including Airflow Presto SQL and Hive SQLppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience creating and maintaining data pipelinesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience supporting engineering product workp
